string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I need you to report to someone in the field. I have marked his location on your PDA.
Good luck stalker.
Sniper
Major Kuznetsov has ordered you to eliminate the target. The deadline is two days.

So, soldier, we have one high priority goal, in the death of which the Security Service of Ukraine itself is interested, and this goal is not so easy to get to, you know? We will need to act quietly and quickly. All our special fighters for such special tasks are busy, so I need an experienced sniper, even though you do not look like him at all. Your deadline is two days.
Well, I must say I was wrong about you. Well done. Take it, don't be shy:
Assault Enemy Camp
Destroy the camp. The deadline is half a day.

There are stalkers in the area, and we're preparing an attack on their camp. There's information they're gonna do something I don't like, so get them out of here fast, you've got half a day. Get a squad together and move out.
Well done, you made me happy. That's what I'm supposed to do:
Defend Military Base
Protect the military base from a future assault. Date of execution - 6 hours.
Okay, so somebody lost all their fear. Some stalkers have been spotted in the area and we suspect they're preparing an attack on our base. Neutralize the threat, you've got six hours to do it.
Oh, come on, what can I say? Oh, yeah, extra money:
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
One of our allies needs our help. Report to him and see what assistance you can give.
Good luck stalker.
Battle Plans
Lieutenant Kirilov learned the location of important documents, and now it is necessary to capture them. The deadline is 24 hours.

You need a job, right? There's always work. I have information about a scheme where some stalkers have hidden some important papers. I need you to get them out of there. Don't drag it out too long, they can take it, so the maximum you've got is 24 hours.
All right, give them here... All right, thank you:
Patrol Local Area
Patrol the area around Agoroprom.
It's your turn for sentry duty. Patrol the local area and keep an eye out for any unauthorized personnel.
Good work. The commander will be pleased.
Bribe Kuznetsov To Join the Military
Major Kuznetsov will accept a 8,000 UAH payment to let you join the Military

You want to enlist? Well, you'll never pass the physical requirements will all the radiation you've absorbed in the Zone. Tell you what though, if you're willing to slip me 8,000 UAH I might be persuaded to look the other way.
Very well. Welcome to the Military, soldier.
Stop Unauthorized Incursions
You've been tasked to lead a sweep operation. The deadline is 24 hours.

So, I understand that in the stalker zone of the pond, but lately these creatures are flies, and the bosses are not happy with it, and I get a hat. We need to reduce the number of unaccounted-for faces a little bit, okay? You've got 24 hours at your disposal.
Okay, don't worry, you didn't do anything illegal. Here you go:
Capture Territory for Kuznetsov
There's been an order to take over the territory for a new camp. The deadline is two days.

You should know that the SBU is searching for documents, evidence and reasons for the Zone and our unit has been instructed to penetrate further into the Zone to conduct the research operation. The commander is looking for volunteers to take over the bridgehead for us. Would you like to help? Not for nothing. This has to be done before the research team gets here, so you have two days.
The task is done? Good job. I'll inform the commander right away of your success.
Capture Enemy Combatant
The task is to capture or kill the enemy in 12 hours.

You're on time, though. A couple hours ago, it was reported that a creature had killed our officer who was on a mission. We need to take him hostage and bust him half to death and then send him to the zone. You're allowed to kill as a last resort, but you know it's not going to do any good. You've got 12 hours before he goes into hiding.
Outstanding work! The bosses will be pretty, and so will you:
Assault territory
You have been assigned to lead an assault to clear out any unauthorized individuals.

The commander is concerned about the rising number of incursions into the Zone. He wants you to go in and sweep an area for unauthorized personnel. Keep alert for any friendlies, but anyone else you see you are cleared to shoot on sight.
Great job. Keep it up you'll be in line for a commendation.
Capture territory
You have been ordered to capture territory within the Zone.
Our unit has been tasked with pushing further into the Zone. The commander is looking for volunteers to capture territory for us. Can I inform him of your cooperation?
The task is done? Good job. I'll inform the commander right away of your success.
Capture enemy target
You have been assigned a hostile target to capture or kill.
HQ has a list of of most wanted individuals in the Zone. If you can get to any of them, there will be a bonus in your next paycheck. Are you up for the job?
Outstanding work! The commander will be pleased.
Eliminate all targets
You have been tasked to eliminate all mutants in the area, with expressed permission to eliminate any other hostile threats.

After a recent emission, the mutant population in the area has risen considerably. Normally we keep it under control with the hind, but the aerial gunner is on leave; We're looking for a volunteer to fill his position in his absence. Your personnel record mentions you have experience as a gunner. What do you say, soldier?
Outstanding work! The commander will be pleased.
Find %s for Kirilov
It's necessary to bring %s to Lieutenant Kirillov - technician on the base. He'll pay for the tool and, in addition, will be able to provide more complex upgrades of weapons or armor.

Listen, soldier, would you do me a favor? Almost every day, soldiers come to me with broken shells, and my cat cried. It's not like I'm gonna get armor wrapped up in duct tape, right? Maybe you can get me some of the easiest belts and I'll get you some money, hmm?
Anyway, if you find a set of tools, bring them, I'll owe you one.
Great! You brought exactly what I've asked. Thanks.
Find %s for Kirilov
%s are required by Kirilov to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Find %s for Kirilov
Lieutenant Kirillov asked to find a set of tools for calibration. The technician will pay for the tool and, in addition, will be able to provide more complex upgrades of weapons or armored vest.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
I need tools to calibrate. If you bring it in, you'll get a discount on the repair.

Perfect! Well, now we won't have to break our heads anymore than patch up armor, and we'll lose less fighters. Thank you, all right. If you need anything, you're welcome, I'll help you in any way I can.
